author: kristwaa
msg: Initial check-in of a ASF CMS-based site for Apache DB.
The content is incomplete and is not ready for publishing.
The content is taken from the existing DB site, but with some modifications
in various files. If this new site goes live, it must be authored and approved
by the DB PMC. NOTE: There are pages missing :)
Site look has been made pretty similar to the existing site.
Known issues and differences from existing site:
(may or may not have to be addressed within the CMS)
a) No icon for external links. Use JavaScript?
b) Added a basic sitemap. Sorted by file name, not title - change?
view.pm and path.pm were copied from the River TLP and adapted.

author: dspicar
msg: CLEREZZA-716: changed how to dynamically provide the service with the highest service ranking such that it is entirely managed by the ImageReaderService and implementations of ImageReader do not have to care.
